title: PATT Standard T&S Grant December 2012 for Dr D A Green
abstractText: The observations planned are Proposal 23-011 "Radio Emission from Low-Mass YSOs".
impactText:
This &quot;grant&quot; was for an oberving trip to the GMRT.
The observations have been produced a scientific
publication.
findingsText: Successfully detected radio emission from a young star. Likely to prompt further studies in this area. Other
